certifications.description: Achieved a 4 star fraternity ranking by the Office of Fraternity and Sorority Affairs (highest possible ranking). Led chapter of 30+ members to work towards goals that improve and promote community service, academics, and unity.

projects.name: Blogging Platform
projects.description: Developed a full-stack blog platform with MERN and Redux Toolkit, achieving a 30% reduction in feature development time. Integrated Cloudinary for image management, increasing upload efficiency by 40%. Enabled users to post, read, update, and delete blogs, with a responsive UI built using Tailwind CSS, enhancing user engagement by 25%.

projects.name: FullStack Self-Portfolio
projects.description: Developed a dynamic portfolio using React, integrating EmailJS for direct communication, improving response time by 50%. Designed a responsive, visually appealing interface with smooth navigation and interactive elements, resulting in a 40% increase in user engagement.

projects.name: Fake Store
projects.description: Developed a fake store application with React.js, Redux Toolkit, and Tailwind CSS, reducing development time by 30%. Designed a responsive interface with Tailwind CSS, improving user experience across devices by 40%.

experiences.description: Developed a landing page using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, enhancing visual appeal and user engagement. Created a portfolio website with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to showcase skills and projects effectively. Built a calculator application using JavaScript, demonstrating proficiency in scripting and logic implementation.

Developing a food ordering app using React, Node.js, Express, MongoDB, and Redux Toolkit. Enabled user authentication, profile management, and secure payment integration. Features include restaurant browsing, menu viewing, cart management, and order placement with responsive design.
